chargeHist.descr: Sex Assault of Student by School Staff
Sex Assault of Student by School Staff

result.execSummary:
The defendant Andy L. Follen was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Sex Assault of Student by School Staff, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.095(2).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Concurrent with: probation now being served in Clark County

miscConds.notes: GFE to obtain/maintain FTE/schooling or combination thereof of at least 30 hours per week, or defendant must provide 5 verifiable job contacts per week.

No contact with victim, S.L.K. or her family. 

No contact with females under the age of 18 years unless as allowed by PO.

If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.  

A copy of the police report has been electronically sent to the probation office.

Any assessment, treatment, counseling as deemed appropriate by PO. DNA sample.  Sex offender registration for a period of 15 years.

Case called: 1:41pm
State appears by ADA Theresa Wetzsteon.  Def appears in person and with Atty John Stichert.  
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed.  VRCW.

COURT notes receipt of correspondence received from defendant's employer.
Atty Stichert files report card of defendant and makes statement regarding agreement.

State moves to:
Ct. 2 (Sexual Assault of Student by School Staff)>>D&RI.
COURT GRANTS ABOVE.

PLEA:
Ct. 1 (Sexual Assault of Student by School Staff)>>GUILTY

COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made,  a factual basis & def guilty.


COURT ORDERS: Sentence W/held; 3 years Probation, concurrent with probation now being served in Clark County.
CONDITIONS: Any assessment/treatment/counseling as deemed appropriate by PO; No contact with victim S.L.K. or her family; No contact with females under age 18 years unless as allowed by PO; GFE to obtain/maintain FTE/FT schooling or combination thereof of at least 30 hours per week, or defendant must provide 5 verifiable job contacts per week; DNA sample and surcharge; CC; Sex offender registration for a period of 15 years.
